quiz.question: _____ negligence
quiz.explanation: 疏忽，严重的疏忽。The company was sued for gross negligence in safety procedures. 公司因安全程序中的严重的疏忽被起诉。

quiz.question: ________ diligence
quiz.explanation: 勤奋，习惯性的勤奋。Her habitual diligence earned her a promotion. 她习惯性的勤奋为她赢得了晋升。

quiz.question: ____ ambience
quiz.explanation: 氛围，舒适的氛围。The café had a cozy ambience with soft lighting. 咖啡馆有柔和灯光的舒适的氛围。

quiz.question: __________ prescience
quiz.explanation: 预知，非凡的预知。Her remarkable prescience about market trends was impressive. 她对市场趋势的非凡的预知令人印象深刻。

quiz.question: _____ conscience
quiz.explanation: 良心，清白的良心。He had a clear conscience about his decision. 他对自己的决定有清白的良心。

quiz.question: _____ ebullience
quiz.explanation: 热情洋溢，巨大的热情洋溢。The crowd greeted the team with great ebullience. 人群以巨大的热情洋溢迎接球队。

quiz.question: _____ convenience
quiz.explanation: 便利，每一种便利。The apartment had every convenience. 公寓有每一种便利。

quiz.question: _____ transience
quiz.explanation: 短暂，人类的短暂。The poet reflected on human transience. 诗人反思人类的短暂。

quiz.question: _________ ambivalence
quiz.explanation: 矛盾心理，情感上的矛盾心理。She felt emotional ambivalence about leaving. 她对离开感到情感上的矛盾心理。

quiz.question: ________ insolence
quiz.explanation: 无礼，令人震惊的无礼。His shocking insolence to the teacher was punished. 他对老师令人震惊的无礼受到了惩罚。

quiz.question: ___ flatulence
quiz.explanation: 胀气，气体胀气。The medication helped reduce gas flatulence. 药物帮助减少气体胀气。

quiz.question: commence __________
quiz.explanation: 开始，开始运营。The factory will commence operations next month. 工厂将于下月开始运营。

quiz.question: ________ eminence
quiz.explanation: 高地，山地高地。They climbed to the mountain eminence for the view. 他们爬到山地高地观看风景。

quiz.question: impertinence __ ______
quiz.explanation: 无礼，对长辈的无礼。His impertinence to elders was unacceptable. 他对长辈的无礼是不可接受的。

quiz.question: ____ deference
quiz.explanation: 尊重，表示尊重。The students would show deference to the professor. 学生们会对教授表示尊重。

quiz.question: ______ circumference
quiz.explanation: 周长，圆周长。Calculate the circle circumference using the formula. 使用公式计算圆周长。

quiz.question: _____ conference
quiz.explanation: 会议，新闻发布会。The president held a press conference. 总统举行了新闻发布会。

quiz.question: _____ interference
quiz.explanation: 干扰，无线电干扰。Radio interference affected the broadcast. 无线电干扰影响了广播。

quiz.question: ____ belligerence
quiz.explanation: 好战，公开的好战。His open belligerence alarmed the diplomats. 他公开的好战使外交官感到担忧。

quiz.question: quintessence __ ___
quiz.explanation: 精髓，艺术的精髓。This painting represents the quintessence of art from that period. 这幅画代表了那个时期艺术的精髓。

quiz.question: ___ competence
quiz.explanation: 能力，工作能力。The interview tested her job competence. 面试测试了她的工作能力。

quiz.question: ____ pretence
quiz.explanation: 假装，仅仅是假装。His kindness was mere pretence. 他的善良仅仅是假装。

quiz.question: _______ inadvertence
quiz.explanation: 疏忽，由于疏忽。The error occurred through inadvertence. 错误是由于疏忽发生的。

quiz.question: subsistence _______
quiz.explanation: 生存，生存农业。Many villagers practiced subsistence farming. 许多村民从事生存农业。

quiz.question: ______ persistence
quiz.explanation: 坚持，顽强的坚持。Her dogged persistence paid off in the end. 她顽强的坚持最终得到了回报。

quiz.question: ______ affluence
quiz.explanation: 富裕，突然的富裕。Sudden affluence changed their lifestyle. 突然的富裕改变了他们的生活方式。

quiz.question: __ consequence
quiz.explanation: 结果，结果。In consequence of the storm, the event was cancelled. 由于暴风雨的结果，活动被取消了。

quiz.question: ____ __ eloquence
quiz.explanation: 雄辩，雄辩的天赋。The speaker had a gift of eloquence. 演讲者有雄辩的天赋。

quiz.question: evince ________
quiz.explanation: 表现出，表现出兴趣。She would evince interest in the project. 她会对这个项目表现出兴趣。

quiz.question: ensconce _______
quiz.explanation: 安置，安置自己。He would ensconce oneself in the comfortable chair. 他会把自己安置在舒适的椅子上。

quiz.question: denounce __________
quiz.explanation: 谴责，谴责腐败。The activists would denounce corruption publicly. 活动人士会公开谴责腐败。

quiz.question: pierce ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 刺穿，刺穿面纱。The investigation would pierce the veil of secrecy. 调查会刺穿保密的面纱。

quiz.question: coerce __________
quiz.explanation: 强迫，强迫供认。Police cannot coerce confession from suspects. 警方不能强迫嫌疑人供认。

quiz.question: acquiesce __
quiz.explanation: 默许，默许。She decided to acquiesce in their decision. 她决定默许他们的决定。

quiz.question: _____ coalesce
quiz.explanation: 合并，想法合并。Different ideas coalesce into a unified theory. 不同的想法合并成统一的理论。

quiz.question: convalesce __ ____
quiz.explanation: 康复，在家康复。The patient would convalesce at home after surgery. 患者术后会在家康复。

quiz.question: _________ effervesce
quiz.explanation: 冒泡，香槟冒泡。Champagne effervesce when opened. 香槟打开时会冒泡。

quiz.question: traduce _ _____
quiz.explanation: 诽谤，诽谤对手。He would traduce a rival to gain advantage. 他会诽谤对手以获得优势。

quiz.question: adduce ________
quiz.explanation: 引证，引证证据。The lawyer would adduce evidence to support the claim. 律师会引证证据支持主张。

quiz.question: produce _______
quiz.explanation: 产生，产生结果。Hard work will produce results. 努力工作会产生结果。

quiz.question: _______ _ truce
quiz.explanation: 休战，宣布休战。The warring sides agreed to declare a truce. 交战双方同意宣布休战。

quiz.question: ________ facade
quiz.explanation: 外墙，建筑外墙。The building facade was beautifully restored. 建筑外墙被精美修复。

quiz.question: _____ cavalcade
quiz.explanation: 骑兵队，皇家骑兵队。The royal cavalcade passed through the streets. 皇家骑兵队穿过街道。

quiz.question: ____ brocade
quiz.explanation: 锦缎，丝绸锦缎。The dress was made of luxurious silk brocade. 这件连衣裙由豪华的丝绸锦缎制成。

quiz.question: _________ cascade
quiz.explanation: 瀑布，瀑布级联。The waterfall cascade tumbled down the rocks. 瀑布级联从岩石上倾泻而下。

quiz.question: renegade _______
quiz.explanation: 叛徒，叛徒士兵。The renegade soldier defected to the enemy. 叛徒士兵叛逃到敌方。

quiz.question: _____ blockade
quiz.explanation: 封锁，海上封锁。The naval blockade prevented supplies from arriving. 海上封锁阻止了补给到达。

quiz.question: ______ stockade
quiz.explanation: 栅栏，监狱栅栏。The prisoners were held in the prison stockade. 囚犯被关押在监狱栅栏内。

quiz.question: ________ glade
quiz.explanation: 林间空地，林地空地。They rested in a peaceful woodland glade. 他们在宁静的林地空地休息。

quiz.question: _____ fusillade
quiz.explanation: 连续射击，步枪连续射击。A rifle fusillade echoed through the valley. 步枪连续射击在山谷中回荡。

quiz.question: ___ accolades
quiz.explanation: 赞誉，赢得赞誉。The film would win accolades at the festival. 这部电影会在电影节上赢得赞誉。

quiz.question: _______ promenade
quiz.explanation: 散步，晚间散步。Couples enjoyed an evening promenade along the beach. 情侣们沿着海滩享受晚间散步。

quiz.question: ______ colonnade
quiz.explanation: 柱廊，大理石柱廊。The temple featured a magnificent marble colonnade. 寺庙有壮观的大理石柱廊。

quiz.question: ____ charade
quiz.explanation: 字谜游戏，玩字谜游戏。The children would play charade at the party. 孩子们会在派对上玩字谜游戏。

quiz.question: abrade ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 磨损，磨损表面。Rough handling would abrade the surface. 粗暴处理会磨损表面。

quiz.question: ______ masquerade
quiz.explanation: 化装舞会，化装舞会。The guests attended the masked masquerade. 客人们参加了化装舞会。

quiz.question: centigrade _____
quiz.explanation: 摄氏度，摄氏度刻度。Temperature is measured on the centigrade scale. 温度用摄氏度刻度测量。

quiz.question: _____ tirade
quiz.explanation: 长篇大论，愤怒的长篇大论。He launched into an angry tirade. 他开始了愤怒的长篇大论。

quiz.question: crusade _______
quiz.explanation: 十字军东征，反对的十字军东征。She led a crusade against poverty. 她领导了反对贫困的十字军东征。

quiz.question: wade ______
quiz.explanation: 涉水，涉水穿过。They had to wade across the shallow stream. 他们不得不涉水穿过浅溪。

quiz.question: cede _________
quiz.explanation: 割让，割让领土。The defeated nation had to cede territory. 战败国不得不割让领土。

quiz.question: accede __ _______
quiz.explanation: 同意，同意要求。The government would accede to demands. 政府会同意要求。

quiz.question: secede ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 脱离，脱离联邦。The state threatened to secede from union. 该州威胁要脱离联邦。

quiz.question: intercede ___
quiz.explanation: 调解，为...调解。He would intercede for the accused. 他会为被告调解。

quiz.question: supersede _ ____
quiz.explanation: 取代，取代规则。The new policy would supersede a rule. 新政策会取代规则。

quiz.question: abide __ _____
quiz.explanation: 遵守，遵守规则。All students must abide by rules. 所有学生必须遵守规则。

quiz.question: _____ herbicide
quiz.explanation: 除草剂，使用除草剂。Farmers apply herbicide to control weeds. 农民使用除草剂控制杂草。

quiz.question: _____ fungicide
quiz.explanation: 杀菌剂，喷洒杀菌剂。Gardeners spray fungicide on infected plants. 园丁在受感染的植物上喷洒杀菌剂。

quiz.question: _________ germicide
quiz.explanation: 杀菌剂，家用杀菌剂。Household germicide kills bacteria effectively. 家用杀菌剂有效杀死细菌。

quiz.question: _____ insecticide
quiz.explanation: 杀虫剂，喷洒杀虫剂。The farmer would spray insecticide on crops. 农民会在作物上喷洒杀虫剂。

quiz.question: ___ pesticide
quiz.explanation: 杀虫剂，使用杀虫剂。Organic farms avoid using pesticide. 有机农场避免使用杀虫剂。

quiz.question: glide ______
quiz.explanation: 滑行，滑行穿过。The swan would glide across the pond. 天鹅会滑行穿过池塘。

quiz.question: backslide ____
quiz.explanation: 倒退，倒退到。He threatened to backslide into old habits. 他有倒退到旧习惯的危险。

quiz.question: bromide ______
quiz.explanation: 溴化物，溴化物片。The doctor prescribed a bromide tablet for anxiety. 医生为焦虑开了溴化物片。

quiz.question: deride ________
quiz.explanation: 嘲笑，嘲笑对手。He would deride opponent in debates. 他会在辩论中嘲笑对手。

quiz.question: reside __
quiz.explanation: 居住，居住在。They reside in the city center. 他们居住在市中心。

quiz.question: preside ____ _______
quiz.explanation: 主持，主持会议。The chairman would preside over meeting. 主席会主持会议。

quiz.question: ode __ ___
quiz.explanation: 颂歌，欢乐颂。Beethoven composed the famous ode to joy. 贝多芬创作了著名的欢乐颂。

quiz.question: bode ___
quiz.explanation: 预示，预示不祥。The dark clouds bode ill for the picnic. 乌云预示不祥野餐。

quiz.question: forebode ____
quiz.explanation: 预示，预示邪恶。The ominous signs forebode evil. 不祥的征兆预示邪恶。

quiz.question: ____ ___ lode
quiz.explanation: 矿脉，富矿脉。Miners discovered a rich ore lode. 矿工发现了富矿脉。

quiz.question: corrode ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 腐蚀，腐蚀金属。Salt water will corrode the metal. 盐水会腐蚀金属。

quiz.question: avant-garde ___
quiz.explanation: 前卫，前卫艺术。The museum displayed avant-garde art. 博物馆展出了前卫艺术。

quiz.question: occlude ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 堵塞，堵塞动脉。A blood clot can occlude the artery. 血栓会堵塞动脉。

quiz.question: preclude ___________
quiz.explanation: 排除，排除可能性。The evidence would preclude possibility of innocence. 证据会排除清白的可能性。

quiz.question: exclude ______
quiz.explanation: 排除，排除选项。We cannot exclude option completely. 我们不能完全排除选项。

quiz.question: __________ prelude
quiz.explanation: 前奏曲，管弦乐前奏曲。The concert began with an orchestral prelude. 音乐会以管弦乐前奏曲开始。

quiz.question: allude __________
quiz.explanation: 暗指，间接暗指。He would allude indirectly to the scandal. 他会间接暗指这起丑闻。

quiz.question: _____ interlude
quiz.explanation: 插曲，短暂的插曲。There was a brief interlude before the final act. 最后一幕前有短暂的插曲。

quiz.question: denude ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 剥蚀，剥蚀土地。Deforestation would denude the land. 森林砍伐会剥蚀土地。

quiz.question: prude ________
quiz.explanation: 拘谨的人，拘谨的人的态度。Her prude attitude shocked no one. 她拘谨的人的态度没有让任何人震惊。

quiz.question: obtrude _______
quiz.explanation: 强加，强加意见。Don't obtrude opinion on others. 不要强加意见给别人。

quiz.question: extrude _______
quiz.explanation: 挤压，挤压塑料。The machine would extrude plastic into shapes. 机器会挤压塑料成型。

quiz.question: ____ ____ desuetude
quiz.explanation: 废弃，陷入废弃。The old law fell into desuetude. 旧法律陷入废弃。

quiz.question: solicitude ___
quiz.explanation: 关怀，关怀。She showed solicitude for the sick child. 她对生病的孩子表示关怀。

quiz.question: ____ solitude
quiz.explanation: 独处，寻求独处。The writer would seek solitude to work. 作家会寻求独处工作。

quiz.question: ______ amplitude
quiz.explanation: 振幅，信号振幅。The signal amplitude was too weak. 信号振幅太弱了。

quiz.question: plenitude __ ____
quiz.explanation: 充足，数据的充足。There was a plenitude of data available. 有数据的充足可用。

quiz.question: __________ magnitude
quiz.explanation: 震级，地震震级。The earthquake magnitude was 7.5. 地震震级为7.5级。

quiz.question: _____ turpitude
quiz.explanation: 堕落，道德堕落。The scandal revealed his moral turpitude. 丑闻揭露了他的道德堕落。
